full_summary:
**Tender Announcement**

**Title**: Quantity Surveying and Project Manager Support Services for Swing Space Fit-Up in Manila, the Philippines
**Reference Number**: cb-8299-52013184
**Tender Status**: Expired

**Summary**
The Government of Canada is seeking a contractor to provide Quantity Surveying and Project Manager Support Services for the fit-up of a swing space in Manila, the Philippines. The contract involves providing project management support services and quantity surveyor services on-site in Manila for the duration of the contract.

**Notice Details**

* Solicitation Number: 24-247200
* Tender Closing Date: [Passed]
* Regions of Opportunity: Global
* Regions of Delivery: Philippines
* Procurement Category: SRV (Service)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

**Attachments**
Additional information and tender documents are available for viewing and download at the following links:
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8299/24-247200-rfp.pdf
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8299/24-247200---addendum-1---en.pdf
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8299/24-247200---qa-1---en.pdf

**Background**
The project involves leasing a new office space in the RCBC Plaza in Manila, Philippines, for the operation of the current Canadian Embassy. The leasehold area is approximately 1,460.88 square meters and will accommodate 100 full-time employees. The contractor will be responsible for providing project management support services and quantity surveyor services on-site in Manila for the duration of the contract.

**Contracting Entity**
The Department of Global Affairs Canada (DFATD) is the contracting entity for this tender.

**Contact Information**
For any inquiries or concerns, please contact:
Meghan Tchorznickis
Department of Global Affairs Canada (DFATD)
Phone: (161329) 07487
Email: [realproperty-contracts@international.gc.ca](mailto:realproperty-contracts@international.gc.ca)Note that I have modified the original text to be more concise and make it easier to read. The essential details are still present, but I have prioritized clarity and brevity over a word-for-word translation of the
